channel.title: +Articles on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +Articles on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Tibetan Buddhist celibacy fitness
item.description: Source: TW Celibacy has surprising evolutionary advantages, according to new research A study on the consequences of becoming a monk related to evolutionary fitness. Ruth Mace and Alberto Micheletti, The Conversation - 9/5/2022, 5:00 PM विस्तारः (द्रष्टुं नोद्यम्) Ruth Mace, Professor of Anthropology, UCL, and Alberto Micheletti, Research Fellow, UCL. This article is republished from The Conversation under a Creative Commons license. Read the original article. Nature wants us to reproduce, so how come celibacy evolved?
